mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `lcap_user_f803ac` LEFT JOIN `lcap_user_dept_mapping_f803ac` ON `lcap_user_f803ac`.`user_id` = `lcap_user_dept_mapping_f803ac`.`user_id` LEFT JOIN `lcap_department_f803ac` ON `lcap_user_dept_mapping_f803ac`.`dept_id` = `lcap_department_f803ac`.`dept_id`
`lcap_user_f803ac`.`user_name` LIKE concat('%', concat(#{filter.userName}, '%'))
`lcap_user_f803ac`.`display_name` LIKE concat('%', concat(#{filter.userName}, '%'))
`lcap_user_f803ac`.`phone` LIKE concat('%', concat(#{filter.phone}, '%'))
#{filter.phone} = ''
